categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Kotan was a male Human watchman soldier of the Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY he was posted on Taris, where he got infected with the Rakghoul plague. He was later killed by an Imperial spacer.
Infected Master Kotan appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion enemy on Imperial version of Taris.
